001package net.tvburger.jdl.cnn;
002
003import java.util.Arrays;
004import java.util.List;
005
006public class ConvolutionalNetwork implements ConvolutionalNetworkLayer {
007
008    private final List<ConvolutionalNetworkLayer> layers;
009
010    public static ConvolutionalNetwork of(ConvolutionalNetworkLayer... layer) {
011        return new ConvolutionalNetwork(Arrays.asList(layer));
012    }
013
014    public ConvolutionalNetwork(List<ConvolutionalNetworkLayer> layers) {
015        this.layers = layers;
016    }
017
018    @Override
019    public ConvolutionalShape getInputShape() {
020        return layers.getFirst().getInputShape();
021    }
022
023    @Override
024    public ConvolutionalShape getOutputShape() {
025        return layers.getLast().getOutputShape();
026    }
027
028    @Override
029    public ConvolutionalShape transform(ConvolutionalShape input) {
030        ConvolutionalShape currentShape = input;
031        for (ConvolutionalNetworkLayer layer : layers) {
032            currentShape = layer.transform(currentShape);
033        }
034        return currentShape;
035    }
036
037}
